announcements.announcement:
This release provides the following security fixes:
- Added missing safe_mode/open_basedir checks inside the error_log(), file_exists(), imap_open() and imap_reopen() functions. - Fixed overflows inside str_repeat() and wordwrap() functions on 64bit systems. - Fixed possible open_basedir/safe_mode bypass in cURL extension. - Fixed overflow in GD extension on invalid GIF images. - Fixed a buffer overflow inside sscanf() function. - Fixed memory_limit restriction on 64 bit system.
In addition to the security fixes, both releases include a small number of non-security related bug fixes.
For a full list of changes in PHP 4.4.4, see the [ChangeLog](/ChangeLog-4.php#4.4.4).
